name: red_rooster
text: this is exactly how i've always pictured an irs audit. it's hilarious when you put it into words.

name: pants
text: auditing sounds sort of like the awkward silence at first between boyfriend and girlfriend when one finds out the other was cheating on them.

name: idsyen
text: "Awkward silence" is a pretty optimistic way to describe this scenario.

name: cryztal
text:
Yeah, there are... worse ways for that to go down.

Ending in fake pregnancies, across-the-street slit wrists and overdoses of aspirin.

name: qwerty
text: Your avatar makes this.

name: jamers
text: Todd is the only character whose lines I read out loud. "I run smack in my van!"

name: honesttom
text: The morality is negated by the enthusiasm.

name: cailetshadow
text: I have printed out your comment and when I go home I am putting it on my fridge.

name: antsama
text: That last sentance is my second favorite Roast Beef line in the entire archive.  It's just so... potent.

name: twohundredninety
text: Allow me to implicitly ask the obvious question!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: So potent Todd is scared straight the one and only time ever. So Potent.

name: pan-optic
text: Replace some vowels with numerals and that's a spam subject line I've probably already received.

name: zem
text: I don't know. Reruns don't really make sense in the context of a webcomic. It seems like you could just provide a link to the old one. And its even weirder here, where we've got separate ratings and comments for both versions.

name: zem
text: it's

name: killerlimpet
text: Monty Python's Flying Sirrrr-KUS!

name: soticoto
hrm
text: by the way did you know that the foot is from Bronzino's Venus, Cupid, Folly and Time

name: puguglypress
text: It's an even trade because YOU also gave ME a chubby.

name: cheeks_jd
text: Beef thinks it's dope to do your tax early.

name: thomgreenwood
text: He's right. Filin' early is dope.

name: clever-nickname
text:
He just looks at you and he knows that you lied

Roast Beef's description is epic-like.

name: ebessan
text: I don't think Beef's tax advice helped much, considering that Todd nearly got the lethal injection because of messing up his taxes so bad.

name: gigs
text:
I always assumed the order of events was the other way around. Todd done fucked up so much, he ain't risking doing his taxes by himself.

Although, shit, that doesn't really explain why Todd gets so freaked out about getting audited if he almost got killed last time.

name: pogo
text: A valuable lesson intax evasion (and I'm working ina tax preparation office as I read it -- delicous irony)

name: aperson
pogo
text: Okay, I was supposed to be working, my ass was in the chair, but my mind was on Achewood.  Guilty as charged.  Now, pussicutor, else ya got?

name: aperson
text: Unless you were also drunk, we're even.

name: pogo
text: Even, Steven.  Say, isn't it strange to be having a present-day discussion back here amidst these year-old posts?

name: tekende
text: p...pussicutor?

name: nabeel84
text: Why does the RSS feed now go to this strip?
